title: FS: NEW Large Lot of 75 Low Grade T206 **ALL CARDS $10 EACH**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Large Lot of 75 Low Grade T206 **ALL CARDS $10 EACH**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are all low grade cards as the scans will show. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

**ALL CARDS ARE $10 EACH**

**ALL CARDS SOLD..THANKS!**
One weekend bump on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Price drop on the remaining cards.  All cards now $10 each!  Thanks for looking.
One last bump on these before I send the rest to eBay.  Thanks for looking!

The pics are a bit tough for me to make out- can I get individual scans of the Cleveland ones in the lot? is that possible?

Thanks!
